    qwirkle  

    • Uses of Board in qwirkle

      Methods in qwirkle that return Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Board Board.deepcopy()
      copy's the current board
      Board Game.getBoard()
      get the board of the game
      Methods in qwirkle with parameters of type Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.lang.String Player.determineMove(Board board)
      gets a new move from either ComputerPlayer or HumanPlayer
      java.lang.String HumanPlayer.determineMove(Board board)
      asks the humanPlayer for input to get a new Move
      java.lang.String ComputerPlayer.determineMove(Board board)
      the method that determines what a computerplayer will do in a move (except for the first move) It will first collect all possible places where a tile can be placed After that, the AI will try to place one Tile on every possible place, test the move and save the score After all places and all tiles have been tried, the method returns the move with the best score THIS AI ONLY PLACES ONE TILE AT A TIME
      java.lang.String ComputerPlayer.makeFirstMove(Board board)
      Makes a first move for the computerplayer
      java.lang.String Player.makeMove(Board board, java.lang.String msg)
      Method used by the server to determine if a move is valid if the move is valid, it is placed on the board
      Constructors in qwirkle with parameters of type Board 
      Constructor and Description
      TestMove(Board board, int[][] move, Tile[] hand)
      creates a new instance of TestMove The move is set on the board.
